Analyst Misek said Apple's future is likely to increasingly overlap with Google in the areas of cloud computing, advertising, and content. Eric Schmidt could help position Apple for that shift. political operatives say he must do if he hopes to be re-elected. "The jury is still out on which way the Bill Clinton is going to go," said Greg Mueller , a Republican political strategist. Will he continue to draw lines in the sand far to the left of the electorate or is he going to lurch to the middle the way Bill Clinton did to see if he can come back? The State of the Union is the kickoff of his re-election campaign.
